timeline.message: Add health indicator metrics, allow access to endpoint.
Move Prometheus Configuration, only allow from specified IP.

timeline.author: kloessst

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I extracted it into a constant.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.author: kloessst
kloessst

timeline.bodyText: You could define constants for "artemis.health", "Artemis Health Indicator", "healt(h)indicator". But this could also hurt readability.
timeline.author: kloessst
